name: Hangar 9 Aviation, LLC
about: Hangar 9 Aviation, LLC is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to helping individuals achieve their aviation dreams. With convenient locations at Huntington Tri-State Airport, Charleston's West Virginia International Yeager Airport, and Ona Airpark, we offer a range of services including flight training, maintenance, and charter flights. Our experienced instructors guide students through the process of obtaining their pilot certifications, whether they are beginners or seasoned pilots seeking new challenges. We provide a supportive and professional environment, ensuring that every student receives the highest quality training. At Hangar 9 Aviation, we are committed to helping you soar to new heights and discover what lies beyond the horizon.
services:

Intro Flight
